info.name: ReviselaAPI
info.description: Collection for testing the Revisela API authentication and user management endpoints

request.description: Register a new user

Create a new user (requires admin)
Get all users

Get a user by email
Update a user
Delete a user
Get the current user's profile
Upload a profile image (max 5MB)
Create a new quiz
Get all public quizzes with pagination
Get a quiz by ID
Get all quizzes created by the authenticated user
Search quizzes by title, description, or tags
Get quizzes filtered by tag
Update a quiz (only quiz creator can update)
Move a quiz to trash (soft delete)
Create a duplicate of a quiz with all its questions
Bookmark or unbookmark a quiz
Get all quizzes bookmarked by the user

variable.description: Quiz ID to move to trash

request.description: Move a quiz to trash (soft delete). Only the quiz creator can move it to trash.
Get all quizzes in the trash belonging to the user

variable.description: Quiz ID to restore from trash

request.description: Restore a quiz from trash. Only the quiz creator can restore it.
Permanently delete a quiz from trash. Only the quiz creator can permanently delete it.
Upload an image or audio file (max 15MB). Returns the file key, presigned URL, and file type.
Upload a profile image (max 5MB)
Get a presigned URL for accessing a file
Delete a file from S3
Create a new folder
Create a subfolder within a parent folder
Get all folders owned by or shared with the user
Get a folder by ID
Update a folder's properties
Delete a folder (only owner or admin can delete)
Duplicate a folder including all of its subfolders and quizzes
Bookmark or unbookmark a folder
Get all folders bookmarked by the user

variable.description: Quiz ID to add to the folder

request.description: Add a quiz to a folder

variable.description: ID of the folder to move

request.description: Move a folder to another folder. The folder being moved will become a subfolder of the target folder. This endpoint handles all necessary parent-child relationship updates and prevents cyclic dependencies.

variable.description: ID of the quiz to move

request.description: Move a quiz from its current folder(s) to a target folder. The quiz will be removed from all current folders and added to the target folder. You can move a quiz if you are either the quiz creator or have admin access to any folder containing the quiz.
Share a folder with other users via email

variable.description: Folder ID to generate share link for

request.description: Generate a shareable link for a folder

variable.description: Folder ID to move to trash

request.description: Move a folder to trash (soft delete). Only the folder owner or admin can move it to trash.
Get all folders in the trash belonging to or shared with the user

variable.description: Folder ID to restore from trash

request.description: Restore a folder from trash. Only the folder owner or admin can restore it.
Permanently delete a folder from trash. Only the folder owner or admin can permanently delete it.
Create a new class. Only authenticated users can create classes.
